chapter.text: 26|1|Tba-sina-mima.
26|2|Egulo suspasta kitabera ayata.
26|3|Tara mumina hacche na bale apani hayata manokaste atmaghati haye parabena.
26|4|Amara icche karale asamana theke tadera kache eka nidarsana nayila karatama, phale setara prati tadera ghara binata haye parata.
26|5|Ara yakhana'i tadera kache dayamayera kacha theke kono natuna upadesa ase, takhana'i tara ta theke mukha phiriye neya.
26|6|Ata'eba, tara to mithyaropa kareche. Kaje'i tara ya niye thatta-bidrupa karata tara prakrta barta tadera kache sighra'i ese parabe.
26|7|Tara ki yaminera dike laksya kare na? Amara tate pratyeka prakarera aneka utkrsta udbhida udgata karechi [1]
26|8|niscaya ete ache nidarsana, ara tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya.
26|9|Ara niscaya apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|10|Ara smarana karuna, yakhana apanara raba musake deke balalena, ‘apani yalima sampapradayera kache yana
26|11|‘phira‘a'unera sampapradayera kache; tara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na?’
26|12|Musa balechilena, ‘he amara raba! Ami asanka karachi ye, tara amara upara mithyaropa karabe
26|13|‘ebam amara baksa sankucita haye parache, ara amara jihba to sabalila ne'i. Kaje'i harunera prati'o ohi pathana.
26|14|‘Ara amara birud'dhe to tadera eka abhiyoga ache, sutaram ami asanka karachi ye, tara amake hatya karabe.’
26|15|Allah‌ balalena, ‘na, kakhana'i naya, ata'eba apanara ubhaye amadera nidarsanasaha yana, amara to apanadera sathe'i achi, srabanakari.
26|16|‘Ata'eba, apanara ubhaye phira‘a'unera kache yana ebam baluna, ‘amara to srstikulera rabera rasula
26|17|yate tumi amadera sathe yete da'o bani isara'ilake [1].’
26|18|Phira‘a'una balala, ‘amara ki tomake saisabe amadera madhye lalana-palana karini? Ara tumi to tomara jibanera bahu bachara amadera madhye katiyecha
26|19|‘ebam tumi tomara kaja ya karara ta karecha; tumi to akrtajna.’
26|20|Musa balalena, ‘ami to eta karechilama takhana, yakhana ami chilama bibhraanta’ [2].

26|21|‘Tarapara ami yakhana tomadera bhaye bhita halama takhana ami tomadera kacha theke paliye giyechilama. Erapara amara raba amake prajna (nabu'oyata) diyechena ebam amake rasuladera antarbhukta karechena.
26|22|‘Ara amara prati tomara ye anugrahera katha ullekha kare tumi daya dekhaccha ta to e'i ye, tumi bani isara'ilake dase parinata karecha [1].’
26|23|Phira‘a'una balala, ‘srstikulera raba abara ki?’
26|24|Musa balalena, ‘tini asamanasamuha o yamina ebam tadera madhyabarti saba kichura raba, yadi tomara niscita bisbasi ha'o.’
26|25|Phira‘a'una tara asepasera lokadera laksa kare balala, ‘tomara ki bhala kare sunacha na?’
26|26|Musa balalena, ‘tini tomadera raba ebam tomadera purbapurusadera'o raba.’
26|27|Phira‘a'una balala, ‘tomadera prati prerita tomadera rasula to abasya'i pagala.’
26|28|Musa balalena, ‘tini purba o pascimera ebam tadera madhyabarti saba kichura raba; yadi tomara bujhe thako!’
26|29|Phira‘a'una balala, ‘tumi yadi amara paribarte an'yake ilaharupe grahana kara ami tomake abasya'i kararud'dha karaba.’
26|30|Musa balalena, ‘ami yadi tomara kache kono spasta bisaya niye asi, tabu'o [1]?’
26|31|Phira‘a'una balala, ‘tumi yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe ta upasthita kara.’
26|32|Tarapara musa tamra lathi niksepa karale tatksanat ta eka spasta ajagare [1] parinata hala.
26|33|Ara musa tara hata bera karale tatksanat ta darsakadera drstite subhra ujjbala pratibhata hala.
26|34|Phira‘a'una tara asepasera parisadabargake balala, ‘e to eka sudaksa jadukara
26|35|‘se tomaderake tomadera desa theke tara jadubale bahiskrta karate caya. Ekhana tomara ki karate bala?’
26|36|Tara balala, ‘take o tara bha'ike kichu abakasa da'o ebam nagare nagare sangrahakaderake patha'o
26|37|‘yena tara tomara kache pratiti abhijna jadukarake upasthita kare.’
26|38|Atahpara eka nirdharita dine nirdista samaye jadukaraderake ekatra kara hala
26|39|ebam lokaderake bala hala, ‘tomara'o samabeta hacche ki
26|40|‘yena amara jadukaradera anusarana karate pari, yadi tara bijayi haya.’
26|41|Atahpara jadukarera ese phira‘a'unake balala, ‘amara yadi bijayi ha'i amadera jan'ya puraskara thakabe to?’
26|42|Phira‘a'una balala, ‘hyam, takhana to tomara abasya'i amara ghanisthadera samila habe.’
26|43|Musa taderake balalena, ‘tomara ya niksepa karara ta niksepa kara.’
26|44|Atahpara tara tadera rasi o lathi niksepa karala ebam tara balala, ‘phira‘a'unera iyayatera sapatha! Amara'i to bijayi haba.’
26|45|Atahpara musa tara lathi niksepa karalena, sahasa seta tadera alika kirtiguloke graasa karate lagala.
26|46|Takhana jadukarera sajadabanata haye parala.
26|47|Tara balala, ‘amara imana analama srstikulera rabera prati
26|48|‘yini musa o harunera'o raba.’

26|49|Phira‘a'una balala, ‘ki! Ami tomaderake anumati deyara age'i tomara tara prati bisbasa karale? Se-i to tomadera pradhana ye tomaderake jadu siksa diyeche. Sutaram sighra'i tomara era parinama janabe. Ami abasya'i tomadera hata ebam tomadera pa biparita dika theke kete phelaba ebam tomadera saba'ike sulabid'dha karaba'i.’
26|50|Tara balala, ‘kono ksati ne'i [1], amara to amadera rabera kache'i pratyabartanakari.
26|51|Amara asa kari ye, amadera raba amadera aparadha ksama karabena, karana amara muminadera madhye agrani.’
26|52|Ara amara musara prati ohi karechilama e marme ye, ‘amara bandaderake niye rate bera ha'una [1], abasya'i tomadera pascad'dhabana kara habe.’
26|53|Tarapara phira‘a'una sahare sahare loka sangrahakari pathala
26|54|e bale, ‘era to ksudra ekati dala
26|55|ara tara to amadera kraodha udreka kareche
26|56|Ara amara to saba'i sada satarka.’
26|57|Pariname amara phira‘a'una gosthike bahiskrta karalama tadera udyanaraji o prasrabana hate
26|58|ebam dhana-bhandara o suramya saudhamala hate.
26|59|Erupa'i ghatechila ebam amara bani isara'ilake karechilama esabera adhikari [1].
26|60|Atahpara tara suryodayakale tadera pichane ese parala.
26|61|Atahpara yakhana du‘dala parasparake dekhala, takhana musara sangira balala, ‘amara to dhara pare gelama!’
26|62|Musa balalena, ‘kakhana'i naya! Amara sange achena amara raba [1]; satbara tini amake pathanirdesa karabena.’
26|63|Atahpara amara musara prati ohi karalama ye, apanara lathi dbara sagare aghata karuna. Phale ta bibhakta pratyeka bhaga bisala parbatera mata haye gela [1]
26|64|ara amara sekhane kache niye elama an'ya dalatike
26|65|ebam amara ud'dhara karalama musa o tara sangi sakalake
26|66|tarapara nimajjita karalama an'ya dalatike.
26|67|Ete to abasya'i nidarsana rayeche, kintu tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya.
26|68|Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|69|Ara apani tadera kache ibarahimera brttanta barnana karuna.
26|70|Yakhana tini tara pita o tara sampradayake balechilena, ‘tomara kisera ibadata kara?’
26|71|Tara balala, ‘amara murtira puja kari sutaram amara nisthara sathe seguloke amkare thakaba.’
26|72|Tini balalena, ‘tomara yakhana ahbana kara takhana tara tomadera ahbana sone ki?’
26|73|‘Athaba tara ki tomadera upakara kimba apakara karate pare?’
26|74|Tara balala, ‘na, tabe amara amadera pitrpurusaderake peyechi, tara erupa'i karata.’
26|75|Ibarahima balalena, ‘tomara ki bhabe dekhecha, yadera ‘ibadata tomara kare thaka
26|76|‘tomara ebam tomadera purbabarti pitrpurusara
26|77|srstikulera raba byatita era saba'i to amara satrau.
26|78|‘Yini amake srsti karechena, atahpara tini'i amake hedayata diyechena.
26|79|Ara ‘tini'i amake kha'oyana o pana karana.
26|80|‘Ebam rogakranta hale tini'i amake arogya dana karena [1]
26|81|‘Ara tini'i amara mrtyu ghatabena, tarapara amake punarjibita karabena.
26|82|‘Ebam yara kache asa kari ye, tini kiyamatera dina amara aparadha ksama kare debena.
26|83|‘He amara raba! Amake prajna dana karuna ebam satkarmasiladera sathe miliye dina.
26|84|‘Ara amake parabartidera madhye yasasbi karuna [1]
26|85|‘ebam amake sukhamaya jannatera adhikaridera antarbhukta karuna
26|86|‘ara amara pitake ksama karuna, tini to pathabhrastadera samila chilena [1].
26|87|‘Ebam amake lanchita karabena na punarut'thanera dine [2]
26|88|‘ye dina dhana-sampada o santana-santati kono kaje asabe na
26|89|‘se dina upakrta habe sudhu se, ye allah‌ra kache asabe bisud'dha antahkarana niye.’
26|90|Ara muttakidera nikatabarti kara habe jannata
26|91|ebam pathabhrastadera jan'ya unmocita kara habe jahannama [1]
26|92|taderake bala habe, ‘tara kothaya, tomara yadera ‘ibadata karate
26|93|‘allah‌ra paribarte? Tara ki tomadera sahayya karate pare athaba tara ki atmaraksa karate saksama?’
26|94|Atahpara taderake ebam patha bhrastakariderake jahanname niksepa kara habe adhomukhi kare [1]
26|95|ebam ibalisera bahinira sakalake'o.
26|96|Tara sekhane bitarke lipta haye balabe
26|97|‘allah‌ra sapatha! Amara to spasta pathabhrastataya nimajjita chilama,’
26|98|‘yakhana amara tomaderake srstikulera rabera samakaksa ganya karatama.
26|99|‘Ara amaderake kebala duskrtikarira'i pathabhrasta karechila
26|100|‘ata'eba, amadera kono suparisakari ne'i.
26|101|Ebam kono sahrdaya bandhu'o ne'i.
26|102|‘Haya, yadi amadera ekabara phire ya'oyara suyoga ghatata, tahale amara muminadera antarbhukta haye yetama [1]!’
26|103|Ete to abasya'i nidarsana rayeche, kintu tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya.
26|104|Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|105|Nuhera sampradaya rasulaganera prati mithya aropa karechila.
26|106|Yakhana tadera bha'i nuha taderake balechilena, ‘tomara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na
26|107|‘Ami to tomadera jan'ya eka bisbasta rasula.
26|108|‘Ata'eba, tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara [1].
26|109|‘Ara ami tomadera kache era jan'ya kono pratidana ca'i na; amara puraskara to srstikulera rabera kache'i ache.
26|110|‘Kaje'i tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara.’
26|111|Tara balala, ‘amara ki tomara prati bisbasa sthapana karaba athaca itarajanera tomara anusarana karache?’
26|112|Nuha balalena, ‘tara ki karata ta amara janara ki darakara?’
26|113|‘Tadera hiseba grahana to amara rabera'i kaja; yadi tomara bujhate
26|114|ara ami to ‘muminaderake tariye deyara na'i.
26|115|‘Ami to sudhu ekajana spasta satarkakari.’
26|116|Tara balala, ‘he nuha! Tumi yadi nibrtta na ha'o tabe tumi abasya'i patharera aghate nihatadera madhye samila habe.’
26|117|Nuha balalena, ‘he amara raba! Amara sampradaya to amara upara mithyaropa kareche.
26|118|Kaje'i apani amara o tadera madhye spasta mimansa kare dina ebam amake o amara sathe yesaba mumina ache, taderake raksa karuna [1].’
26|119|Atahpara amara take o tara sange yara chila, taderake raksa karalama bojha'i nauyane [1].
26|120|Erapara amara baki saba'ike dubiye dilama.
26|121|Ete to abasya'i nidarsana rayeche, kintu tadera adhikansa'i imanadara naya.
26|122|Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|123|‘Ada sampradaya rasuladera prati mithyaropa karechila.
26|124|Yakhana tadera bha'i huda taderake balalena, ‘tomara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na
26|125|‘ami to tomadera jan'ya eka bisbasta rasula.
26|126|‘Ata'eba, tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara.
26|127|‘Ara ami tomadera kache era jan'ya kono pratidana ca'i na, amara puraskara to srstikulera rabera kache'i.
26|128|‘Tomara ki pratiti ucca sthane [1] stambha nirmana karacha nirarthaka [2]
26|129|‘ara tomara prasadasamuha [1] nirmana karacha yena tomara sthayi habe [2].
26|130|Ara yakhana tomara aghata hana takhana aghata hene thaka sbecchacari haye.
26|131|Sutaram tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara.
26|132|Ara tomara tamra taka'oya abalambana kara yini tomaderake dana karechena se samudaya, ya tomara jana.
26|133|Tini tomaderake dana karechena catuspada jantu o putra santana
26|134|ebam udyana o prasrabana
26|135|‘ami to tomadera jan'ya asanka kari mahadinera sastira.’
26|136|Tara balala, ‘tumi upadesa da'o ba na-i da'o, ubhaya'i amadera jan'ya samana.
26|137|‘Eta to kebala purbabartidera'i sbabhaba.
26|138|‘Amara mote'i sastiprapta habo na.’
26|139|Sutaram tara tara prati mithyaropa karala phale amara taderake dhbansa karalama. Ete to abasya'i ache nidarsana; kintu tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya [1].
26|140|Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|141|Samuda sampradaya rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila.
26|142|Yakhana tadera bha'i saliha taderake balalena, ‘tomara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na
26|143|‘ami to tomadera jan'ya eka bisbasta rasula.
26|144|Sutaram tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara
26|145|‘ara ami tomadera kache era jan'ya kono pratidana ca'i na, amara pratidana to srstikulera rabera kache'i ache.
26|146|‘Tomaderake ki nirapada abasthaya chere rakha habe, ya ekhane ache tate
26|147|‘udyane, prasrabane
26|148|‘o sasyaksetre ebam sukomala guccha bisista khejura bagane
26|149|‘ara tomara naipunyera sathe pahara kete ghara nirmana karacha.
26|150|Sutaram tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara
26|151|ara tomara simalanghanakaridera nirdesera anugatya karo na
26|152|‘yara yamine biparyaya srsti kare ebam sansodhana kare na.’
26|153|Tara balala, ‘tumi to jadugrastadera an'yatama.
26|154|‘Tumi to amadera mata'i ekajana manusa, kaje'i tumi yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe ekati nidarsana upasthita kara.’
26|155|Saliha balalena, ‘eta ekata ustrai, era jan'ya ache pani panera pala ebam tomadera jan'ya ache nirdharita dine pani panera pala
26|156|‘ara tomara era kono anista sadhana karo na; karale mahadinera sasti tomadera upara apatita habe.’
26|157|Atahpara tara setake hatya karala, pariname tara anutapta hala.
26|158|Atahpara sasti taderake graasa karala. Ete abasya'i rayeche nidarsana, kintu tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya.
26|159|Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|160|Lutera sampradaya rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila
26|161|yakhana tadera bha'i luta taderake balalena, ‘tomara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na
26|162|‘ami to tomadera jan'ya eka bisbasta rasula.
26|163|‘Kaje'i tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara.
26|164|‘Ara ami era jan'ya tomadera kache kono pratidana ca'i na, amara pratidana to srstikulera rabera kache'i ache.
26|165|‘Srstikulera madhye to tomara'i ki purusera sathe upagata ha'o
26|166|‘ara tomadera raba tomadera jan'ya ye striganake srsti karechena taderake tomara barjana kare thaka. Baram tomara to eka simalanghanakari sampradaya.’
26|167|Tara balala, ‘he luta! Tumi yadi nibrtta na ha'o, tabe abasya'i tumi nirbasita habe.’
26|168|Luta balalena, ‘ami abasya'i tomadera e kajera ghrnakari.
26|169|‘He amara raba! Amake ebam amara paribara-parijanake, tara ya kare ta theke raksa karuna.’
26|170|Tarapara amara take ebam tara paribara-parijanake sakalake raksa karalama.
26|171|Eka brd'dha chara [1], ye chila pichane abasthanakaridera antarbhukta.
26|172|Tarapara amara apara sakalake dhbansa karalama.
26|173|Ara amara tadera upara sasti mulaka brsti barsana karechilama, bhiti pradarsitadera jan'ya e brsti chila kata nikrsta [1]
26|174|ete to abasya'i nidarsana rayeche, kintu tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya.
26|175|Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|176|A'ikabasira [1] rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila
26|177|Yakhana su‘a'iba taderake balechilena, ‘tomara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na
26|178|ami to tomadera jan'ya eka bisbasta rasula.
26|179|‘Kaje'i tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara.
26|180|‘Ara ami tomadera kache era jan'ya kono pratidana ca'i na. Amara puraskara to srstikulera rabera kache'i ache.
26|181|‘Mape purna matraya debe; ara yara mape kama deya tomara tadera antarbhukta hayo na
26|182|‘ebam ojana karabe sathika damripallaya.
26|183|‘Ara lokaderake tadera prapya bastu kama di'o na ebam prthibite biparyaya srsti kare beri'o na.
26|184|Ara tamra taka'oya abalambana kara yini tomaderake o tomadera age yara gata hayeche taderake srsti karechena.’
26|185|Tara balala, ‘tumi to jadugrastadera antarbhukta
26|186|‘ara tumi to amadera mata'i ekajana manusa, amara to tomake mithyabadidera antarbhukta mane kari.
26|187|‘Sutaram tumi yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe akasera eka khanda amadera upara phele da'o.’
26|188|Tini balalena, ‘amara raba bhala kare janena tomara ya kara.’
26|189|Sutaram tara tara prati mithyaropa karala, phale taderake meghacchanna dinera sasti grasa karala [1]. E to chila eka bhisana dinera sasti
26|190|ete to abasya'i rayeche nidarsana [1], ara tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya.
26|191|Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|192|Ara niscaya eta (ala-kura'ana) srstikulera raba hate nayilakrta.
26|193|Bisbasta ruha (jibara'ila) ta niye nayila hayechena.
26|194|Apanara hrdaye, yate apani satarkakaridera antarbhukta hate parena.
26|195|Suspasta arabi bhasaya [1].
26|196|Ara purbabarti kitabasamuhe abasya'i era ullekha ache.
26|197|Bani isara'ilera alemagana e samparke jane---eta ki tadera jan'ya nidarsana naya [1]
26|198|ara amara yadi eta kono anarabera upara nayila karatama
26|199|ebam eta se tadera kache patha karata, tabe tara tate imana anata na
26|200|ebhabe amara seta aparadhidera antare sancara karechi [1].
26|201|Tara ete imana anabe na yataksana na tara yantranadayaka sasti dekhate pabe
26|202|sutaram ta tadera kache ese parabe hathat kare; athaca tara kichu'i upalabdhi karate parabe na.
26|203|Takhana tara balabe, ‘amaderake ki abakasa deya habe?’
26|204|Tara ki tabe amadera sasti tbaranbita karate caya
26|205|apani bhebe dekhuna, yadi amara taderake dirghakala bhoga-bilasa karate de'i [1]
26|206|tarapara taderake ye bisaye satarka kara hayechila ta tadera kache ese pare
26|207|takhana ya tadera bhoga-bilasera upakarana hisebe deya hayechila ta tadera ki upakare asabe
26|208|ara amara emana kono janapada dhbansa karini yara jan'ya satarkakari chila na [1]
26|209|(tadera jan'ya) smarana hisebe, ara amara yulumakari na'i
26|210|ara sayatanara etasaha nayila hayani.
26|211|Ara tara e kajera yogya'o naya ebam tara era samarthya'o rakhe na.
26|212|Taderake to sonara suyoga hate dure rakha hayeche.
26|213|Ata'eba apani an'ya kono ilahake allah‌ra sathe dakabena na, dakale apani sastipraptadera antarbhukta habena.
26|214|Ara apanara nikatastha jnati-gosthike satarka karuna.
26|215|Ebam yara apanara anusarana kare sesaba muminadera prati apanara paksaputa abanata kare dina.
26|216|Atahpara tara yadi apanara abadhya haya tahale apani baluna, ‘tomara ya kara niscaya ami ta theke dayamukta.’
26|217|Ara apani nirbhara karuna parakramasali, parama dayalu allah‌ra upara
26|218|yini apanake dekhena yakhana apani damrana [1]
26|219|ebam sajadakaridera majhe apanara uthabasa [1].
26|220|Tini to sarbasrota, sarbajna.
26|221|Tomaderake ki ami janaba kara kache sayatanara nayila haya
26|222|tara to nayila haya pratyekati ghora mithyabadi o papira kache.
26|223|Tara kana pete thake ebam tadera adhikansa'i mithyabadi [1].
26|224|Ara kabigana, tadera anusarana to bibhraantara'i kare.
26|225|Apani ki dekhena na ye, ora udabhraanta haye pratyeka upatyakaya ghure beraya
26|226|ebam tara to bale emana katha, ya tara kare na.

26|227|Kintu tara chara yara imana eneche, satkaja kareche, allah‌ke besi parimana smarana kareche ebam atyacarita ha'oyara para pratisodha grahana kareche. Ara yalimara sighra'i phire yabe janabe kona dharanera gantabyasthale tara phire yabe.
